title: Asian carrot, noodle and peanut salad

ingredients.item: 4 carrots, shredded or cut into matchsticks
2 echalion shallots, thinly sliced into rings
2 red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
4 tbsp fresh lime juice (from about 2-3 limes)
2 handfuls roasted peanuts (salted or unsalted), roughly chopped

instructions.step: Soak the noodles in boiling water according to pack instructions. Drain and run under the cold tap until cool. Drain again, then put in a mixing bowl with the carrots, shallots and chillies.

Mix the sugar, lime juice, soy sauce and garlic, then stir in the sunflower oil to make a dressing. Pour over the noodles and carrots, taste and season with a little salt, if needed. Toss the herbs through the salad. Divide between 4 bowls and scatter the peanuts on top.
